blog.name: danandphilsurvey
blog.description: Started in 2015, the phandom survey is a yearly fandom survey done in the style of the Nerdfighteria census.

summary: 2018 Dan and Phil Survey Analysis Masterpost
title: 2018 Dan and Phil Survey Analysis Masterpost
body:
This post links to all of the individual posts containing additional analysis of the 2018 Dan and Phil Survey results. There are two parts to this post. In the first part, analysis posts that make comparisons to results from previous years are grouped together. In the second part, posts are grouped together according to the survey topic(s) the analysis pertains to. Most individual analysis posts are linked to more than once.

Original survey results can be found here.

———Part 1: Comparisons to Previous Years———

  • Can you show how the responses to the question about how survey participants perceive Dan and Phil’s relationship have changed over time?
  • Can you show how the responses to the questions about how survey participants perceive Dan and Phil’s sexualities have changed over time?
  • Can you show how the responses to the question about whether survey participants have started a relationship with someone thanks to Dan and Phil have changed over time?
  • How has the age distribution of survey participants changed over the years?
  • How have the responses to the questions about gender identity and whether people identify as cis, trans, non-binary, or intersex changed over the years?
  • Can you show how the responses to the questions about survey participants’ sexuality and romantic attraction have changed over time?

———Part 2: Analysis by Survey Topic———

Channel Questions

  • How do people’s first impressions of Dan and Phil’s sexualities change by their year of discovery of Dan and Phil?

Preferences

  • what is the relationship between viewer sexuality and preferred type of content (joint, individual)?

Video Preferences

No analysis was performed on the questions pertaining to this topic.

Phan

  • Dan and Phil’s Relationship
    • Can you show how the responses to the question about how survey participants perceive Dan and Phil’s relationship have changed over time?
    • For people who selected multiple answers for the question regarding their impression of the nature of Dan and Phil’s relationship, what does the breakdown of combinations of responses look like?
    • what is the relationship between perception of Dan and Phil’s relationship and where survey participants’ consume content/feel they are a part of?
    • what is the relationship between perception of Dan and Phil’s relationship and survey participants’ experience of sexuality/romantic attraction?
    • What is the relationship between viewer sexuality and if they ship phan?
    • How do the responses to the question about why or why not people ship Phan change by social media Phandom?
  • Dan and Phil’s Sexualities
    • Can you show how the responses to the questions about how survey participants perceive Dan and Phil’s sexualities have changed over time?
    • what is the relationship between perception of Dan and Phil’s sexualities and where survey participants’ consume content/feel they are a part of?
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ age?
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ country of residence?
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ gender identity?
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ own experience of sexuality/romantic attraction?
    • How do people’s first impressions of Dan and Phil’s sexualities change by their year of discovery of Dan and Phil?

The Phandom

  • what is the relationship between perception of Dan and Phil’s relationship and where survey participants’ consume content/feel they are a part of?
  • How do the responses to the question about why or why not people ship Phan change by social media Phandom?
  • what is the relationship between perception of Dan and Phil’s sexualities and where survey participants’ consume content/feel they are a part of?
  • What does the age distribution of the Phandom look like by platform (Twitter, Tumblr, Instagram, etc.)?
  • Can you show how the responses to the question about whether survey participants have started a relationship with someone thanks to Dan and Phil have changed over time?

Social Media

  • I was looking at the social media questions and I’d be curious to see how many people responding to the survey even had accounts on those websites, so the numbers could be compared. E.g. if 6/10 people used Twitter but only 4/6 of those followed Dan on Twitter, that could be something that’s brought up. Maybe next time?
  • How does frequency of commenting on Dan and Phil’s YouTube videos change with age?

Interactions with Dan and Phil

  • What is the breakdown of age for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
  • What is the breakdown of country of residence for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
  • What is the breakdown of gender identity for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
  • What is the breakdown of experience of sexuality for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
  • What is the breakdown of experience of romantic attraction for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?

Dan and Phil Products

  • “I would be interested in a general ‘Have you ever spent money on a Dan and/or Phil product or event?’ question as well, or at least pulling from this data how many respondents answered yes to any of the tour/book/merch questions.” and (paraphrasing) How do responses about having bought and/or having been given something produced by Dan and Phil change with age?
  • each question about the DH shop had more people indicating they’d bought something than the last. Can you break that down?

Survey Participant Demographics

  • Age
    • How has the age distribution of survey participants changed over the years?
    • “I would be interested in a general 'Have you ever spent money on a Dan and/or Phil product or event?’ question as well, or at least pulling from this data how many respondents answered yes to any of the tour/book/merch questions.” and (paraphrasing) How do responses about having bought and/or having been given something produced by Dan and Phil change with age?
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ age?
    • What does the age distribution of the Phandom look like by platform (Twitter, Tumblr, Instagram, etc.)?
    • How does frequency of commenting on Dan and Phil’s YouTube videos change with age?
    • What is the breakdown of age for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
  • Country of Residence
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ country of residence?
    • What is the breakdown of country of residence for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
  • Gender Identity
    • How have the responses to the questions about gender identity and whether people identify as cis, trans, non-binary, or intersex changed over the years?
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ gender identity?
    • What is the breakdown of gender identity for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
  • Sexuality/Romantic Attraction
    • Can you show how the responses to the questions about survey participants’ sexuality and romantic attraction have changed over time?
    • what is the relationship between viewer sexuality and preferred type of content (joint, individual)?
    • what is the relationship between perception of Dan and Phil’s relationship and survey participants’ experience of sexuality/romantic attraction?
    • What is the relationship between viewer sexuality and if they ship phan?
    • What is the relationship between survey participants’ view of Dan and Phil’s sexuality and survey participants’ own experience of sexuality/romantic attraction?
    • What is the breakdown of experience of sexuality for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?
    • What is the breakdown of experience of romantic attraction for the questions relating to whether Dan or Phil have ever interacted with survey participants on social media?

This post links to all of the individual posts containing additional analysis of the 2018 Dan and Phil Survey results. There are two parts to this post. In the first part, analysis posts that make comparisons to results from previous years are grouped together. In the second part, posts are grouped together according to the survey topic(s) the analysis pertains to. Most individual analysis posts are linked to more than once.

Original survey results can be found here.

summary: Thanks for the amazing response to my first art upload to tumblr! It was very strange waking up to my tumblr notifications going...
body:
Thanks for the amazing response to my first art upload to tumblr! It was very strange waking up to my tumblr notifications going through the roof, and it’s hard to imagine that ~400 of you have seen my art. I’ve been lurking on tumblr for far too long now, and knowing that some of the people i’ve been following for a long time (*cough* @danielhowall @avisualsnack – just to name a couple of you) have seen my work makes me so happy.

Anyway, you’ve inspired me to spend the day making a gifset of @amazingphil’s beautiful new decorations. Special thanks goes to @phairylights for suggesting that I make stickers of them. I started out making little stickers of the individual decorations, and it morphed into this. (Sorry, @phairylights! Think of them as moving stickers that don’t stick?)

The last gif, ‘lava by the sea’, is dedicated to @thoughtfullightcollectionii, for writing my favourite comment ever: “this looks like a warm bath feels?” Here are some warm ocean vibes just for you. 🏝

summary: I’m gonna make a list of all the fandoms I’m in or like I associate myslef with cause there’s a lot and my blog is really random
body:
I’m gonna make a list of all the fandoms I’m in or like I associate myslef with cause there’s a lot and my blog is really random

-Panic! At The Disco(Brendon Urie is literally the best person on earth and his voice is like heaven and don’t even get me started on Nicole Row or Mike Naran or Dan Pawlovich or Sarah Urie lol I love them all with all my heart)

-Twenty Øne Piløts(Tyler is beautiful. Josh is beautiful. I love the ukulele and RAB is the best TØP album and you can fight me on that)

-Dan and Phil(will Dan ever come back. We don’t know but Phil turned 32 yesterday and somehow he looks like he hasn’t aged at all How does he do it?)

-The Try Guys(they wrote a book I’m gonna cry. Eugene is gonna be guest starring on a tv show I’m proud of him and Keith gave up fried chicken omg thats insane I’m proud of him too oh and Wesley is adorable Ned is such a dad and Zach got to write the part of the book about love I’m gonna cry)

-Shane Dawson, Ryland and Morgan Adams, Garrett Watts, Andrew Siwicki(that conspiracy video yesterday omg I’m obsessed also my favorite line “i’d rather go to hell than get an android”- Garrett Watts I’m dead so much shade Garrett)

-The Shadowhunter Chronicles(probably my favourite series of books series ever and also I will protect Ty Blackthorn and Kit Herondale with my entire life and also Cassie why’d you have to take them away from each other. Kit loved Ty. and you know what Ty definitely loved him back. They didn’t even get to say goodbye Also release TWP sooner so I don’t die)

-PJO,HOO,MCGA,TOA,TKC(Alex Fierro is the best character in this whole world of books FIGHT me)

-Harry Potter

-Dear Evan Hansen(literally the best musical ever if I ever got to see it I’d cry but I haven’t seen it yet.

-My Chemical Romance

-Fall Out Boy(I’m gonna admit something even though I kinda consider myself a fan of the emo quartet I haven’t gotten into to FOB that much but I’ve been trying to recently)

-Troye Sivan(a very amazing human being who has a voice taht makes me want to cry because it’s so good.

-Billie Eilish(she has an amazing voice like come on how is she that amazing and um bury a friend is a bop)

-NED(yes I know he could simply be in the TØP fandom but no I love him so much he deserves his own fandom of Ned lovers he is beautiful and I will protect him with my life.

-Voltron(even though the show was a mess and s8 was terrible I still love the characters)

-Stranger Things(y’all I can’t wait till season 3)

tags: i honestly dont know what i would do without them
summary: Okay so this is a major appreciation post. So yesterday was Phil’s birthday and I’m always late so I figured why not be late...
body: Okay so this is a major appreciation post. So yesterday was Phil’s birthday and I’m always late so I figured why not be late here too, Happy Birthday Phil!!!!!! So anyway these people have seriously helped me through so much, they have helped me get past the many times I wanted to relapse and they never fail to make me smile no matter how many times I watch their videos. I can’t even describe the amount of appreciation and love I have for these men. I haven’t been a part of the phandom for very long, but in the past year I have realized what it is about and why everyone freaks out about it. It isn’t just a fandom it’s a phamily and it’s a phamily that doesn’t discriminate and accepts and helps everyone. I love what these people stand for and how they like making people happy. I am very appreciative for all that they’ve done and I cannot wait to see what the next 10 years will bring us. I have realized that once you are part of the phandom, you will probably never leave, not necessarily because of the content (though we all know we couldn’t live without it 😂) but because of what they stand for. I have so much more I wanna say, but I don’t know how so for now that’s it. Thank you Dan and Phil for making my life so much better ❤️❤️❤️

summary:
as phil’s birthday comes to an end, i just want to say one thing:
thank you. thank you for making me smile on some of the worst...
body:
as phil’s birthday comes to an end, i just want to say one thing:

thank you. thank you for making me smile on some of the worst days. thank you for bringing joy to me whenever i see a notification for one of your videos. and most importantly, thank you for being here. after all these years on youtube you’re still on this hellsite and i couldn’t be more happy. i started watching both you and dan back in 2010 and i was the happiest kid there was at that time. with my birthday coming up next month, i’m not very excited, being people will ask me what i want and all that. but the hype of your birthday right before mine makes me happy enough to want to enjoy my “special day”. keeping it short, thank you so much. i can tell this year is going to be a good one. i hope 32 treats you well, king <3

trail.content:
as phil’s birthday comes to an end, i just want to say one thing:

thank you. thank you for making me smile on some of the worst days. thank you for bringing joy to me whenever i see a notification for one of your videos. and most importantly, thank you for being here. after all these years on youtube you’re still on this hellsite and i couldn’t be more happy. i started watching both you and dan back in 2010 and i was the happiest kid there was at that time. with my birthday coming up next month, i’m not very excited, being people will ask me what i want and all that. but the hype of your birthday right before mine makes me happy enough to want to enjoy my “special day”. keeping it short, thank you so much. i can tell this year is going to be a good one. i hope 32 treats you well, king <3
